name: Ants Inc.
description:
Being an ant is serious business! Type words quickly to keep these tiny workers productive.

How to Play:

  • You manage a team of ants!
  • Keep them working hard by typing all the words that appear on your screen.
  • If you ignore a word for too long, you’ll get fired. Game over!
  • New ants will join your company over time. Gather all 12 ants to win!
